mapper.update: merge into BROWNIE_USER using DUAL on (BROWNIE_USER.user_id = '${id}') when not matched then insert ( USER_ID, LOL_ID, NICK_NAME, BLACK_STACK, STATUS, IN_DATE, UP_DATE, IN_USER_ID, UP_USER_ID, USER_POSITION) values ('${id}', '${tempLolNick}', '${tempBrownieNick}', 0, 'Y', SYSDATE, SYSDATE, '${id}', '${id}', '${position}')

merge into BROWNIE_EXP using dual on (user_id = '${id}') when not matched then insert ( USER_ID, USER_EXP, USER_LEVEL, IN_DATE, IN_USER_ID, UP_DATE, UP_USER_ID ) values ('${id}', 0, 0, sysdate, '${id}', sysdate, '${id}')
mapper.select: SELECT A.PERMIT_LEVEL AS PERMITLEVEL FROM PERMIT A, BROWNIE_USER B WHERE A.USER_ID = B.USER_ID AND A.USER_ID = #{userId}
mapper.update: MERGE INTO REVIEW using dual on (USER_ID = '${id}') when not matched then insert ( REVIEW_SEQ, USER_ID, STAR_CNT, REPLY, IN_DATE, UP_DATE, IN_USER_ID, UP_USER_ID ) values (REVIEW_SEQ.NEXTVAL, '${id}', ${starCnt}, '${reply}', SYSDATE, SYSDATE, '${writeUserId}', '${writeUserId}')
